code: import React from"react";import"./style.scss";import{generatePath,useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{ROUTES}from"../../constants/routes";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductCard=props=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const{id,imgURL,name,typeJewelry,price}=props.product;const formatNumber=num=>{let numString="";while(num>0){let div=num%1000;num=Math.floor(num/1000);if(num!==0){if(div<10){div="00"+div;}else if(div<100){div="0"+div;}numString="."+div+numString;}else{numString=div+numString;}}return numString;};const handleRedirectToDetailProductPage=()=>{navigate(generatePath(ROUTES.DETAIL_PRODUCT_PAGE,{productId:id}));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"product-card-wrapper",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"product-card__img",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:imgURL,alt:name,onClick:handleRedirectToDetailProductPage})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"product-card__name",onClick:handleRedirectToDetailProductPage,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:name})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"product-card__type-jewelry",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:typeJewelry})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"product-card__price",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:formatNumber(price)})})]})});};export default ProductCard;
